mapper.sql: id, brand, commodity_category_id, warehouse_type, bar_code, commodity_identifier, commodity_name, model, selling_price, wholesale_price, cost_price, company_type, supplier_id, upper_limit_number, lower_number, commodity_number, create_time, user_id, last_update_time, user_update_id, remarks ,category_name
mapper.select:
select cc.category_name as categoryName,c.* from sw_commodity c LEFT JOIN sw_commodity_category cc ON cc.id=c.commodity_category_id
order by ${orderByClause}
